snippet: As the business of horse racing continues its long decline, Churchill Downs Inc. has transformed itself into a full-blown gambling company, with interests in casinos and Internet sites.
abstract: Churchill Downs Inc, company that owns home race track of Kentucky Derby, has transformed itself into full-blown gambling company, with interests in casinos and Internet sites; transition was brought on by significant decline in horse racing business.
lead_paragraph: As the business of horse racing continues its long decline, Churchill Downs Inc. has transformed itself into a full-blown gambling company, with interests in casinos and Internet sites.

headline.seo: Kentucky Derby’s Owner Transforms Into a Gambling Company
headline.main: To Race’s Owner, Track Is No Longer at Center of the Business Universe
headline.print_headline: To Race’s Owner, Track Is No Longer at Center of the Business Universe
